doc:
Jason Merrells https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jason_Merrells 0 Jason Scott Merrells (born 2 November 1968 in Epping, Essex) is an English actor, who is best known for his roles as receptionist Matt Hawley in Casualty, stylist Gavin Ferraday in Cutting It, Head Teacher Jack Rimmer in Waterloo Road and Home Farm's owner Declan Macey in Emmerdale. More recently Jason plays the role of David in ITV's Safe House Jason_Scott_Merrells ( born 2_November_1968 in Epping , Essex ) is an_English_actor , who is_best_known for his_roles as receptionist_Matt_Hawley in Casualty , stylist_Gavin_Ferraday in Cutting It , Head_Teacher_Jack_Rimmer in Waterloo_Road and Home_Farm 's_owner_Declan_Macey in Emmerdale .
